column2: # Predict presence under future climatic conditions
# Plot of Probability of Hooded Warbler Presence under future climate
aes(x = x, y = y, fill = probability)) +
labs(title = "GLM - Probability of Hooded Warbler Presence in 50 years") +
ggsave(SDM_forecast, filename = here("Lab6_SDMs_correlative", "maps", "warbler_SDM_forecast.png"), dpi = 150, units = c('in'), width = 10, height = 6)
